statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, access_control_list FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '72962f98-0a19-4389-8b9f-7d345b1426d7';
SELECT count(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_permissions;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_control_list FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control_list @> '{"read": true}';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 AND access_control_list ->> 'write' = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT permission_level, COUNT(*) FROM user_permissions GROUP BY permission_level HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT access_level, permission_type FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM AccessControlLists WHERE list_id = 100
SELECT resource_name, allowed_users FROM AccessControlLists
SELECT user_id, permission_type, access_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT permission_type, access_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type, access_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE access_level >= 5 ORDER BY permission_type ASC;
SELECT MAX(access_level) AS max_access_level FROM UserPermissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS_TEXT(allowed_users) AS user FROM AccessControlLists WHERE resource_name = 'example_resource';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT acl_id, resource_id, access_type FROM access_control_lists WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, block_data FROM blockchain_platform WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_blocks, MAX(block_id) AS max_block_id FROM blockchain_platform;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_type FROM access_control_lists WHERE resource_id = 789;
SELECT block_data, timestamp FROM blockchain_platform WHERE user_id = 321 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_blocks FROM blockchain_platform GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_blocks > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions ORDER BY granted_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_type FROM role_permissions;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2001 AND access_level = 'Read';
SELECT user_id, permission_type, granted_at FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM access_control_list ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin'
SELECT permission_type, role_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 3 ORDER BY permission_type
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2 AND access_level = 'Read'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts LEFT JOIN user_roles ON user_accounts.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE password = 'secure_password'
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_accounts JOIN user_roles ON user_accounts.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id

SELECT roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY role_id DESC
